songs.title: Ridin’ Round and We Drillin’
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
My bitches with the shits if you want beef
And all em' guns bang like Chief Keef
And yep I need a hitta
Fuck the opps
Clap a thot
Bitch we ridin' round and we drillin'(repeat 5x)

[Verse 1]
Bitch i'm ridin' round with dem hittas tho (drillin')
If you ain't drillin', what'chu in it for?
I got bands, so I spend it ho
We don't fight
What the fuck you think dem thirty's for?
Katie in it, I'm with it bitch
Ya'll hoes can't fuck with it
I make the call, they load the clips
Slide through strip, and whack the bitch
We ridin' round, we drillin' tho
Hoes hate, like really tho
Katie got bandz, AKA Katie got hittas tho (bandz)

[Hook]
My bitches with the shits if you want beef
And all em' guns bang like Chief Keef
And yep I need a hitta
Fuck the opps
Clap a thot
Bitch we ridin' round and we drillin'(repeat 5x)

[Verse 2]
(Katie)
Bitch we droppin' thots, if they opps (bitch)
Lay it off, leave her bleedin' like she on a pig
Money mob, team Katie who I'm rockin' with (Katie)
You drillin' what? Stop it slut
You ain't with the shits
My hair long, that subs short
Knock the ho out her boy shorts
And I put that on a bands
Cash out, man hands
They sneak dissin', that's so rude
I'll bang a bitch, so keep it cute
I'm Katie ho, who the fuck is you?
Got Twitter hittas, that a follow you (bandz)

[Hook]
My bitches with the shits if you want beef
And all em' guns bang like Chief Keef
And yep I need a hitta
Fuck the opps
Clap a thot
Bitch we ridin' round and we drillin'(repeat 5x)

(Katie)
